SELECT a.AsmNO,a.Customcode,a.AsmDT,a.Widesize,a.FndHeight,a.PinCount,a.InchCount,a.TotalPin,a.ProdCode,a.ColorCode,a.ManuCrock, a.ContCode,a.Pieces TotalPieces,a.Weights TotalWeights, b.PieceNO,b.Storecode,b.SpaceCode,b.Pieces,b.Quan,b.Unitone,b.PieceLen, c.ParComNameC,c.ParSingleName, d.ProdNameC,e.SName FROM AsmInHead a LEFT JOIN AsmInDetail b ON a.AsmNO = b.AsmNO LEFT JOIN Custom c ON a.Customcode = c.ParComID LEFT JOIN Product d ON a.ProdCode = d.ProdCode LEFT JOIN ProdColor e ON a.ColorCode = e.SCode
a.AsmNO = #{params.asmNo}

SELECT a.AsmOutNO,a.ContNo,a.ManuCrock,a.DeptCode,a.AsmDT,a.ProdCode,a.ColorCode,a.Widesize,a.FndHeight,a.ProdSize, a.ProdInch,a.CustOrderCode,a.TotalPin,a.Yarnbrand,a.OutStyle,a.StoreCode,a.Total TotalWeights,a.Pieces TotalPieces, b.PieceNo,b.Pieces,b.Quan,b.Piecelen, d.ProdNameC,e.SName FROM AsmOutHead a LEFT JOIN AsmOutDetail b ON a.AsmOutNO = b.AsmOutNO LEFT JOIN Product d ON a.ProdCode = d.ProdCode LEFT JOIN ProdColor e ON a.ColorCode = e.SCode
a.AsmOutNO = #{params.asmNo}
